name: Evolution of simple satellites in Drosophila
description: We profiled the simple satellite landscape across 9 Drosophila species.

name: Detecting meiotic drive with pooled sequencing
description: We developed a new approach to identify non-Mendelian transmission frequency from pooled sequeencing. Using this approach we identified a weak centromeric driver
